content.text:
I'm trying to debug a silly issue with [@Current Events](@wNmXqk80DL4FrBjzZcYqbKs/SpsPv6MVX6BLICabPfI=.ed25519) and I'm having some trouble. When I post immediately, everything works fine. When I say "wait 24 hours and post a new message", I always get:

```
Error: stream is closed
    at /home/pi/Source/ssb-current-events/node_modules/muxrpc/index.js:45:25
    at remoteCall (/home/pi/Source/ssb-current-events/node_modules/muxrpc/api.js:40:19)
    at EventEmitter.obj.(anonymous function) [as getLatest] (/home/pi/Source/ssb-current-events/node_modules/muxrpc/api.js:25:18)
    at /home/pi/Source/ssb-current-events/node_modules/ssb-feed/index.js:29:11
    at next (/home/pi/Source/ssb-current-events/node_modules/ssb-feed/queue.js:11:7)
    at start (/home/pi/Source/ssb-current-events/node_modules/ssb-feed/queue.js:18:7)
    at /home/pi/Source/ssb-current-events/node_modules/ssb-feed/queue.js:23:5
    at Object.<anonymous> (/home/pi/Source/ssb-current-events/node_modules/ssb-feed/index.js:57:7)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/home/pi/Source/ssb-current-events/node_modules/continuable/to.js:12:28)
    at getSbot.then (/home/pi/Source/ssb-current-events/lib/publish.js:26:11)
```

My publishing code is [here](https://gitlab.com/christianbundy/ssb-current-events/blob/master/lib/publish.js). I tried moving `require('ssb-client')` into `getSbot()` but it doesn't seem to resolve the issue. Anyone have any ideas on what the issue might be?

cc: #help #ssb-help
